LOOP_ERR_NEED: Uh... oh! The queue is already in repeat mode. If you want to disable it, use the `off` argument.
LOOP_ERR_PLAYING: Uh... oh! No song is currently playing.
LOOP_ERR_ARGS: Uh... oh! You need to provide a valid argument: track, queue, or off.
LOOP_SUCESS_CURRENT: the repeat mode will affect the current song
LOOP_SUCESS_QUEUE: the repeat mode will affect the song queue
LOOP_OFF: the repeat mode has been turned off
LOOP_ERR_ACTIVE: Uh... oh! There is no loop mode currently active.
